/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with a variety of buildings, their architecture hinting at the rich history of the city. Cars and buses traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with wispy clouds, providing a serene backdrop to the urban landscape. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of scale to the scene.
